class.name: Languages
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Holds a collection of language information.
class.property: An array of all Languages available to the course
The default language of the course

method.name: addLanguage
method.description: Adds a langauge object to the collection of available languages

method.name: getLanguage
method.description: Searchs for and returns a langauge object matching the short name
